sentences.en: A new latch - style secondary ejection mechanism is illustrated.
sentences.cn: 列举实例介绍一种新型的“扣机式”二次顶出机构.

sentences.en: A rocket is propelled by the ejection of a portion of its mass to the rear.
sentences.cn: 火箭是靠向后喷射其部分质量而推进的.

sentences.en: Coprimary end points were IRA patency and change in L ejection fraction.
sentences.cn: 主要终点为梗死相关动脉开通和左室射血分数改善.

sentences.en: Ejection murmurs ordinarily occur in midsystole.
sentences.cn: 喷射音一般出现在收缩中期.

sentences.en: Gas ejection from gun muzzle is a more complex unsteady process.
sentences.cn: 火炮的后效期现象是一种比较复杂的非定常气体动力学现象.

sentences.en: Here will be a double ejection for forward and receding.
sentences.cn: 公模两段开模,这个地方先退.

sentences.en: However, ejection fraction and left atrial volume index stayed the same.
sentences.cn: 但是, 射血分数及左房容积仍然不变.

sentences.en: In 2004, Chinese first aviation ejection lifesaving phantom was researched successfully.
sentences.cn: 2004年, 成功研制出我国首具航空弹射救生假人.

sentences.en: L ejection fraction increased 35 % , and pro - brain natriuretic peptide decreased 40 %.
sentences.cn: 左室射血分数升高35%, 同时脑钠肽前体蛋白降低40%.

sentences.en: Most of the crater is formed by ejection.
sentences.cn: 大多数的弹坑是由于把泥土抛出而形成的.

sentences.en: Radioactivity is the ejection of particles or radiation from the nucleus.
sentences.cn: 放射性是原子从核中射出粒子或辐射的现象.

sentences.en: Results Basal ejection fraction and cardiac index were normal in four groups.
sentences.cn: 结果各组射血分数和心脏指数均正常.

sentences.en: The amount or rate of emission or ejection.
sentences.cn: 排放量流量、流速，或排出量，排出的速度。

sentences.en: The most fundamental distinction is between systolic ejection murmurs and pansystolic murmurs.
sentences.cn: 最基本是要分清收缩期喷射音和全收缩期杂音.

sentences.en: The senator was angry about his ejection from the senate.
sentences.cn: 参议员对于被逐出参议院感到非常愤怒.

sentences.en: Your stop is like an ejection seat on an aircraft.
sentences.cn: 止损就想是飞机上的弹射椅.

words.tran_cn: [机] 喷射器；驱逐者；推出器；排出器
